mapper.update:
update HRMDEPARTMENT
DEPARTMENTMARK = #{departmentmark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPARTMENTNAME = #{departmentname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUBCOMPANYID1 = #{subcompanyid1,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SUPDEPID = #{supdepid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ALLSUPDEPID = #{allsupdepid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHOWORDER = #{showorder,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CANCELED = #{canceled,jdbcType=CHAR},
DEPARTMENTCODE = #{departmentcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COADJUTANT = #{coadjutant,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ZZJGBMFZR = #{zzjgbmfzr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZZJGBMFGLD = #{zzjgbmfgld,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JZGLBMFZR = #{jzglbmfzr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JZGLBMFGLD = #{jzglbmfgld,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update HRMDEPARTMENT set DEPARTMENTMARK = #{departmentmark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPARTMENTNAME = #{departmentname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUBCOMPANYID1 = #{subcompanyid1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SUPDEPID = #{supdepid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ALLSUPDEPID = #{allsupdepid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOWORDER = #{showorder,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CANCELED = #{canceled,jdbcType=CHAR}, DEPARTMENTCODE = #{departmentcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COADJUTANT = #{coadjutant,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ZZJGBMFZR = #{zzjgbmfzr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZZJGBMFGLD = #{zzjgbmfgld,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JZGLBMFZR = #{jzglbmfzr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JZGLBMFGLD = #{jzglbmfgld,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update hrmdepartment t set t.supdepid=(select id from hrmdepartment t2 where t2.fid=t.supdepid and rownum=1) where t.fid is not null and exists (select 1 from hrmdepartment t3 where t3.fid = t.supdepid)
mapper.select:
select
from HRMDEPARTMENT where FID = #{fid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and rownum=1
mapper.update: update HRMDEPARTMENT set DEPARTMENTMARK = #{departmentmark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPARTMENTNAME = #{departmentname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUPDEPID = #{supdepid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ALLSUPDEPID = #{allsupdepid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOWORDER = #{showorder,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CANCELED = #{canceled,jdbcType=CHAR}, DEPARTMENTCODE = #{departmentcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
